randomNames 1.0-0.0

June 6th, 2017

This is 1.0 release of the randomNames package. This release is mostly about the creation of vignettes and web-documentation for the package. However, the package now also support Middle Eastern/Arabic names. See the new Getting Started Vignette for more information.

Feel free to drop me a line with any comments, feature requests, or ideas. And give us a shout-out Tweet using the Twitter button in the upper right!

randomNames is a Center for Assessment thing.

Developed & Maintained by Damian W. Betebenner.
